Reviews.Title: “If you are going pay 100 bucks a night, stay somewhere else.”
Reviews.Author: FamilyAdventurer1
Reviews.Content: Overall, it was okay until I had to take a shower....NO HOT WATER! When I called the front desk, Amy told me they ran out of hot water and wait 30 min. I informed her that I took a cold 30 min shower, she then said wait because everyone else is taking a shower. I can suck it up and take a cold shower, but there is no way I will make my 4 year old do that!

Reviews.Title: “Great place!”
Reviews.Author: M H
Reviews.Content: This was a great new hotel! A little hard to find since it was so new my old GPS couldn't map it, and it's on the access road on the interstate. But once found - it was a gem! Friendly staff on check in and out - and quiet even though it was on the interstate.

Reviews.Title: “Very friendly and homey atmosphere...would highly recommend”
Reviews.Author: Missy56163
Reviews.Content: We were there for a family funeral and quite a few of my family members, including siblings, parents, cousins, aunts and uncles stayed here due to the close proximity to the funeral home and my aunt's house. We were treated so nicely. The downstairs area has a TV room and we set up at night as if it were our own living room. The staff was very accomodating. The breakfasts were wonderful ! I would highly recommend staying here !

Reviews.Title: “Not a Good Experience”
Reviews.Author: Familyoffivemom
Reviews.Content: We stayed here on a family vacation. I booked this hotel because it had been built only a yeat before out stay, but we couldn't tell by our experience. Check in went well. Then we unloaded the luggange onto the cart.... The luggage cart had a broken wheel. I reported it to the front desk and their response to that was they already knew. Noone bothered to tell us. Complete hassel getting to the room. We attempted to go swimming, the pool area was like a steam room, and we couldn't breath, not to mention the over powering smell of chlorine. The hand rail in the pool area was broken, which is a safety hazard. The rooms were decent and we thaught it was cool that the speakers to the TV went into the bathroom, but thats about it. After a long day sight seeing wanting nothing more than to get in out room, our key didn't work, both nights of our stay. When we asked for help on directions or any other assistance. The staff was rude or just told us to use the buisness center. No extra help was offered. If you are going to Dallas, I strongly suggest that you find another hotel. Terriable experience.

Reviews.Title: “Don't Forget Anything In Your Room”
Reviews.Author: Pinholecamera
Reviews.Content: This was overall a good hotel with a very nice room and the location was close to downtown and the convention center. However, there are no good restaurants real close. The breakfast was OK but very "institutional" in flavor and variety. However, DO NOT LEAVE ANYTHING BEHIND when you check out or you will not get it back. I had a lock and cable for my suit case and I'm sure I forgot it in my room. I called the next day and I was told it was not found. I was assured by the manager how honest his staff is and that I must be mistaken.

Reviews.Title: “Great stay, completely comfortable!”
Reviews.Author: trawhysee
Reviews.Content: We had a great experience at this location. Check-in was quick and easy. We had an issue with our Priority Club account (totally our fault, not theirs), and the employee fixed it with no problem. The room was at a comfortable temperature when we arrived and everything looked clean. It was a nice, spacious room with 2 queens. We forgot toothpaste, but we were able to get a free travel size one from the front desk! I was so thankful for that! I had one of the best nights sleep I've had in a long time (I'm a new first time mom) and there were no noise disturbances from other guests. Although we were late coming down for breakfast, there were still items left out, so we were able to eat a little something before we headed home. I was surprised because hotels normally put everything away right away. Check-out was a breeze as well. Our only complaint was that the coffee pot wasn't working, but, luckily, there was coffee in the lobby.

Reviews.Title: “Good Hotel - not so good location”
Reviews.Author: ron3573
Reviews.Content: I stayed at this hotel because it was reserved for our family reunion. As mentioned in other reviews the hotel can easily be a 4 star if it was in a different location. The location is the biggest con with the hotel. It's somewhat isolated off a service road, but the hotel is nice. It's fairly new with features you may see in hotel such has door bells, climate control, automated privacy signals, granite, 32" LCD TV and sound in the bathroom from the TV to name a few. I got a suite and it provides a little more room and a sofa bed if you need it. The first night was good, but the second night had a bunch a young adults who wanted to party all night. Because they have security I would still recommend the hotel.

Reviews.Title: “New hotel with nice accomodations”
Reviews.Author: floyd6769
Reviews.Content: Rooms were clean, bed was very comfortable. Staff was very friendly.

Reviews.Title: “Could be a four star hotel...”
Reviews.Author: JediHawk
Reviews.Content: This hotel is very clean with all the amenities you could ask for-including flatscreen tv's and a hot breakfast. There is one MAJOR issue that stops this hotel from being top-flight. That's security. About 5 or 6 vehicles, including mine, were broken into. It did not make any sense since the hotel is very well lit and the parking lot is small. No excuse here. Aside from this, the hotel could actually beat downtown hotels including the Sheraton and Marriot (insofar as rooms are concerned).

Reviews.Title: “Room was small for a suite”
Reviews.Author: MRTNs
Reviews.Content: We did have trouble finding this hotel because when entering this address to our blackberry we forgot to add East and we ended up 30 miles away. We got in late in the evening to this hotel and was hoping our hotel suite would be a little larger. The sofa bed was twin sized and uncomfortable we ended up having to put the twin mattress on the floor. The two beds in the suite were 2 full beds we were expecting queens. The hotel was clean but the hotel pool was not in service. Overall it is a nice hotel but the suite was not up to expectation.

HotelInfo.Name: Holiday Inn Express Dallas East
HotelInfo.Address: 8703 East RL Thornton Freeway, Dallas, TX 75228
